name: Zepho's Adventure
description:
Story

Zepho is a simple white marshmellow with legs! One day he was sleeping, an army of frogs destroyed the whole village, there was only a few survivors. Ever since then he has dedicated his life to hunting down the person that keeps destroying all the villages. Starting with the frog army.

You can find me at:

★ Ko-fi ★ Twitter ★

MacOS port will be coming soon!

Known bugs:

- Water may have a few graphical glitches, if anyone is good with shaders then dm me on twitter!
